query:
WITH
                dummy as (SELECT 1)
                
                    , search_filter as (
                        SELECT
                            r.id,
                            AVG(w.word <<-> unaccent(r.name)) AS rank
                        FROM
                        (
                            SELECT UNNEST(
                                STRING_TO_ARRAY(
                                    unaccent($1)
                                    , ' '
                                )
                            ) as word
                        ) as w
                        CROSS JOIN recipes as r
                        GROUP BY r.id
                        HAVING MAX(w.word <<-> unaccent(r.name)) <= 0.7
                    )
                
                
                
                
                
                    , diet_filter as (
                        SELECT
                            distinct(recipe_id) as id
                        FROM
                            recipes_diets
                        WHERE diet_id = any($2)
                    )
                
                
                
                    , account_filter as (
                        SELECT
                            distinct(id)
                        FROM
                            recipes
                        WHERE author_id = $3
                    )
                
            SELECT
                r.id as "id!",
                r.name as "name!",
                r.image as "image!",
                is_recipe_in_account_favs(r.id, $3) as "is_favorite!",
                r.ingredients as "ingredients!: Vec<QIngredient>",
                r.diets as "diets!: Vec<Diet>",
                n_shares as "n_shares!",
                is_private as "is_private!",
                count(*) OVER() AS "total_count!"
            FROM recipes_full AS r
                 INNER JOIN search_filter as sf USING (id)
                
                
                
                 INNER JOIN diet_filter USING (id)
                
                 INNER JOIN account_filter USING (id)
            WHERE
                is_private = 'f' OR author_id = $3
            ORDER BY
                 sf.rank, 
                
                
                (extract(epoch from publication_date)+id)::bigint % $4
            OFFSET $5
            LIMIT $6
